title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 505 - Personal Privacy Protection
content:

§ 505.8 - Amendment of records and personal information

N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XI, pt. 505

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§1852[3], 1855[4]; Public Officers Law, art. 6-A, §§ 87, 94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
